TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameReferenceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Provides type conversion to convert a string name into an object reference to the object with that name, or to return the name of an object from the object graph.

span.span: Provides type conversion to convert a string name into an object reference to the object with that name, or to return the name of an object from the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供類型轉換器包裝函式約兩個服務。This class provides a type converter wrapper around two services. 實作會使用服務從內容，以在 XAML 中依名稱執行物件的解析度。The implementation uses service from context to perform the resolution of an object by name in XAML. 這是相關的 XAML 讀取器和在.NET Framework XAML 服務 XAML 寫入器實作的一部分。This is part of the relevant XAML reader and XAML writer implementations in .NET Framework XAML Services. 這個轉換子的適當的函式需要服務是可從服務內容。Proper function of this converter requires that the service is available from service context. 實作會使用服務無法儲存/序列化期間執行名稱解析的參考物件的內容。The implementation uses service from context to perform the resolution of a reference name for an object during save/serialization. 這是相關的讀取器和寫入器實作和其內容的一部分。This is part of the relevant reader and writer implementations and their context. 這個轉換子的適當的函式需要有基礎可用的服務。Proper function of this converter requires that there be an underlying service available. 此類型轉換子實作為慣用基底類型，因為其範圍不是離散的轉換類型。This type converter implementation is atypical for the base type because it is not scoped to a discrete conversion type. 它可以可能會將任何物件與參考名稱，只要該物件無法在 XAML 中，指派給它的名稱，且支援的內容具有必要的服務，以傳回結果。It can potentially convert any object to and from a referencing name so long as that object could have a name assigned to it in XAML, and the supporting context has the necessary services to return results. 一般服務支援的一部分，System.Xaml 基底實作和提供和服務以供。As part of general services support, the System.Xaml base implementation of and provide and services for use by . 使用這些服務的名稱基礎`x:Name`或屬性別名屬性。The name basis for these services uses either `x:Name` or a attributed alias property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`destinationType`參考傳回型別`true`; 所有其他`destinationType`值傳回`false`。A `destinationType` that references the type returns `true`; all other `destinationType` values return `false`. 如果此方法會傳回 false`context`是`null`，或如果無法以從服務取得`context`。This method returns false if `context` is `null`, or if cannot be obtained as a service from `context`.
